description: This file defines a LightningJS component for the 'Home' page, utilizing Blits for component structure and including UI elements like logo, loader, text, and button with associated state and lifecycle hooks.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the Home page with animated logo, loader, and text elements, managing state and lifecycle hooks for transitions.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Cycles through predefined colors at specified intervals to animate the loader's color.
